info.text: I'll give you the key to the elevator if you give me some lung tissue and an aveoli. I don't want to touch it, but my friend needs it for research.
[query]Do you have an aveoli and lung tissue to trade for?data*prAVEOLI,prLUNG_TISSUE;Don't lie to me.
Thanks! Heres the key. By the way, the Elevator goes straight to the the rib cage, a part of the Skeletal System.
While the direct connection between the respiratory system and the skeletal system isnâ€™t obvious at first, the respiratory system greatly
benefits from the skeletal system. The rib cage, which is part of the skeletal system, protects the lungs from being damaged when the chest
physically collides with something. The lungs are a vital part of the respiratory system.
